titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, August 5, 1947

mods.tableOfContents: Walter Fire, Eagle City. Slow War Dance. Round Dance. Straight War Dance. Fast War Dance. Sun Dance. Handgame (4). Clan Dance (Brush) (2). Forty Nine Songs. War Dance (3).
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please use the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
